summary: Changes Lydia and Ysolda into Khajiit
descriptionHtml:
I thought it was a bit odd that as a Khajiit you can marry any race but another Khajiit, I found few mods that turn the odd npc into khjiit but I wanted more choice so I changed Ysold and Lydia.

you can now have a Khajiit wife and steward at the same time.

I can also recommend tktk\'s mod Khajiit child Maisha changes one of the heathfire adoptable kids into a Khajiit for the full family of fuzzies.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25654


just got sent this link to a you tube review (sin of pride in abundance at the moment)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ZzTI5rYjM8
author: MattyT9999

files.name: Lydia and Ysolda are Khajiit v1
